pkgmetadata.longdescription: |travis|kthbuild=========Knuth Building Tools (Alpha version)Getting started ---------------Stable version:.. code-block:: bash $ pip install --upgrade kthbuildDevelopment version:.. code-block:: bash $ pip install --upgrade --index-url https://test.pypi.org/pypi/ kthbuild.. |travis| image:: https://travis-ci.org/k-nuth/kthbuild.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/k-nuth/kthbuild
